mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHALLENGE(CHALLENGESEQ, CATEGORY, CHALLENGETITLE, CHALLENGETEXT,CHALLENGESTART, CHALLENGEEND,CHALLENGEPERIOD, IDENTIFYFREQUENCY, IDENTIFYDAY, IDENTIFYTIME, CHALLENGEPHOTO, CHALLENGESAVEPHOTO, RATINGAVG, CHALLENGESTOP, CHALLENGEDEL, HEADERNUM, POINTCOUNT, CHALLENGEMEMBER, EMAIL) VALUES(CHAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{challengetitle}, #{challengetext}, #{challengestart}, #{challengeend}, #{challengeperiod}, #{identifyfrequency}, #{identifyday}, #{identifytime}, #{challengephoto}, #{challengesavephoto}, 0, 0, 0, (SELECT M.AUTH FROM MEMBER M, CHALLENGE C WHERE M.EMAIL = C.EMAIL WHERE C.EMAIL = #{email}), #{pointcount}, 0, #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE (SELECT C.HEADERNUM, M.AUTH FROM CHALLENGE C, MEMBER M WHERE C.EMAIL = M.EMAIL) SET C.HEADERNUM = M.AUTH WHERE
mapper.select: SELECT C.CHALLENGESEQ, M.EMAIL, M.NICKNAME, M.AUTH, M.MEMBERPHOTO FROM CHALLENGE C, MEMBER M WHERE C.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND C.EMAIL = #{email}
